tests.name: Documentation Flag
tests.run: DOC=$(ls -R | grep 'docs\?' | wc -l) && if [ "$DOC" -ge "1" ]; then echo "TRUE"; fi

tests.name: Walkthrough Flag
tests.run: WT=$(grep "youtu\|mp4\|mkv\|vimeo" README* | wc -l) && if [ "$WT" -ge "1" ]; then echo "TRUE"; fi

tests.name: Back End Flag
tests.run: BK=$(ls -R | grep 'server\.js\|main\.js' | wc -l) && if [ "$BK" -ge "1" ]; then echo "TRUE"; fi

tests.name: Front End Flag
tests.run: FE=$(ls -R | grep 'server\.js\|main\.js' | wc -l) && if [ "$FE" -ge "1" ]; then echo "TRUE"; fi
